name: Befouled hand wrappings
data: It increases the users strength unbelievably much.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom adequately.
It decreases the users charisma impossibly much.
It has nice armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration an average amount.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'call for ice'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'advanced martial arts'.
It decreases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'martial arts'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'call for fire'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'call for thunder'.
It decreases the users fire resistance somewhat.
- Extra -
Stolen from the hands of a mummy these wrappings were then enchanted with dark
magics to create an artifact that infuses the hands of a monk with elemental
powers.
